name: PropertyListEncoder
desc: An object that encodes instances of data types to a property list.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new, reusable property list encoder with the default formatting settings.

items.name: func encode<Value>(Value) -> Data
items.desc: Returns a property list that represents an encoded version of the value you supply.

items.name: var outputFormat: PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat
items.desc: A value that determines which property list format is used during encoding.

items.name: var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary you use to customize the encoding process by providing contextual information.
